title: Pumpkin Bourbon Cider Milkshake Recipe

2 servings

2 1/2
cups
apple cider
For Maple Whipped Cream:
1
cup
heavy cream
2
tablespoons
maple syrup
For Milkshakes:
1/4
cup

1
tablespoon
cider reduction

bourbon
3/4

1/2

1

maple syrup

3

6

)
Garnish:
maple whipped cream
Directions
For the cider reduction:
bring cider to a boil in a small saucepan. Let simmer until reduced by half. Let cool and refrigerate 1 hour or up to 1 week. Recipe will make enough for 2 batches of milkshakes.
For the maple whipped cream:
Meanwhile, add cream to the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment, or add to large bowl and use a hand-held electric mixer (see note). Whip on medium speed until soft peaks just begin to form. With mixer running, gradually add maple syrup. Reduce speed to medium low and continue whipping until soft peaks form. Use immediately or refrigerate until ready to serve.
For the milkshakes
: add cider reduction, bourbon, cinnamon, ginger, maple syrup, and pumpkin puree to the jar of a blender. Add ice cream and pulse until smooth. Divide among serving glasses, top each glass with maple whipped cream and serve immediately.
Special Equipment
Stand mixer with whisk attachment or hand mixer, cold bowl, blender
Notes
For best results, chill bowl and whisk or beaters before whipping cream.
